revisions.revision: naming whatever i can figure out

plugin.comment: This contains the definitions for the built-in custom multiplayer game variants

tagblock.name: Appearance Traits
tagblock.tooltip: Traits that affect the player's appearance

option.name: Moving Friendly Bipeds Moving Neutral Vehicles

int8.name: Carrying Points
int8.tooltip: points per second when carrying the ball

int8.name: Ball Kill Points
int8.tooltip: number of points for a melee kill with the ball

int8.name: Carrier Kill Points
int8.tooltip: number of points for killing the ball carrier

int16.name: Ball Spawn Delay
int16.tooltip: time until first ball spawn after round start, and also delay in respawning ball if it goes out of play

int16.name: Ball Inactive Respawn
int16.tooltip: time until ball respawns if it is inactive
